# React Frontend Migration Project

## Project Overview

Migrating Angular frontend to React with Vite for auth system. Rustic, elegant design without Bootstrap.

## Key Requirements

- React 18+ with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- Custom CSS (no Bootstrap)
- Authentication system integration
- Backend API: http://localhost:8080

## Architecture

- Component-based React architecture
- React Router for navigation
- Context API for state management
- Custom hooks for API calls
- Modular CSS approach

## Design Guidelines

- Rustic but professional aesthetic
- Earth tones and natural materials look
- Clean typography and spacing
- Subtle shadows and textures
- Responsive design principles
